attributes.action: To bring a prison  sentence to dog thefts and violent dog snatching
attributes.additional_details: Thieves are stealing  dog to sell at radicals  prices so innocent families  lose there beloved pet that they paid a lot of money for it's all out of control the law needs to do something  now a slap on the wrist is not good enough the soft law effect  is not working
attributes.background: Bring in a law for heavy  fines and prison  sentences  for all the thieves stealing  dogs even mugging people to take there dog this crime is rising  as fast as a virus it needs stamping  out its cruel some of these dogs are companions to old sick and lonely people some are service  dogs d
